text:
October 16, 1961
Professor idward Steeheff
Department of Speech
University of Michigan
Ann Arbor, Michigan
Deer Professor Steeheff t
t have a note on ray calender which says "Write Steeheff re PR
materials for Speech Association convention during Christmas
vacation*" At this point (the note was made a long time ego)
I*m not sure whether this Is e state convention or national, or
what.
Anyway, the idea is to ask you whether you#d be willing to
represent the KAEB at this convention and distribute membership
materials, etc. We could also provide an exhibit. If it could
be used. lt*s about 3 feet tall and ia a 3-panel job, with
each panel being 2 feet wide.
Would you let me know how many people you anticipate will be
there, and where we should send the materials aad When?
Sincerely yours.
(Mrs.) Hetty McKensle
Publications Editor
